item.description: Weather permitting....we are meeting in Ogunquit for all of the above. It's a free for all! Want to play frisbee on the beach....have lunch and go shopping. T-Dance starts at 3pm with DJ Jodi. Some are spending the night. If anyone is looking to stay over let me know so I can hook you up with other members to share a room and save on expenses. It is a beautiful place! Come on let's go to the beach!
item.how_to_find_us: We will just have to look for each other!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Ogunquit T-Dance-Beach-Shopping-Lunch-Women
